textTemplates.name: h_30034ebf09cadd2f36fc444a0557517e_Pharos_Template

Id EqualTo 00Xak00000Eq1rDEAR
Store the values of these fields:
Result
\{!Get_Template} ({!Get_Template})

textTemplates.description: Pharos Flow Template for Log After: Start, Before: Is the birthdate today?
textTemplates.name: h_ab0c94333eccee85f5a1d486e235aa54_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY-STFlow In Progress" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY-STFlow In Progress" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_STFlow_In_Progress
Type: Flow
Version: 7
Status: Obsolete
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY-STFlow In Progress
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
API Version for Running the Flow: 63.0
Some of this flow's variables were set when the interview started.
$Record = Contact ({!$Record})

textTemplates.description: Pharos Flow Template for Log After: Get related Contacts, Before: Wait 1 Minute
textTemplates.name: h_c4928e07b755a3244c04674aeec3168c_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
GET RECORDS: Get related Contacts
Find all Contact records where:
CreatedDate LessThan $Flow.CurrentDate
Department IsNull false
Email IsNull true
Store the values of these fields:
Result
\{!Get_related_Contacts} ({!Get_related_Contacts})

(APEX): h_b0b9770897dff63adcf86fd167ead1ad_PostPreLog
Inputs:
Outputs:

textTemplates.text:

Skipped this outcome because its conditions weren't met: Yes
Outcome conditions:
\{!$Record.Birthdate} ({!$Record.Birthdate}) EqualTo Today
All conditions must be true (and)

Default outcome executed.
